artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a potpourri vase on the left; in the center a woman in a white gown with a dark green overgown and a pink sash around her waist; on the right a woman in a whitish gown with a purple overgown, green detailing at the cuffs and hem, a purple and green striped sash around her waist, and a purple hat with black and green plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Quatorzième Cahier, 11 Avril 1789
